services.title: Consulting and Design
details: Process analysis to identify automation opportunities.
Control engineering: design of control architectures and technology selection.
Feasibility and return on investment (ROI) studies.
Design of SCADA, PLC, and DCS systems.
services.alt: Engineer analyzing an industrial robot in a lab environment.

services.title: System Integration
details: PLC programming (Siemens, Allen-Bradley, Schneider, etc.).
SCADA/HMI integration for real-time monitoring and control.
Automation of production lines and specific machinery.
Industrial communication: Modbus, Profibus, Profinet, Ethernet/IP, OPC-UA networks.
Integration of industrial robots (robotic arm, AGVs/AMRs).
services.alt: Illustration of PLC, Modbus, Profibus and Ethernet/IP industrial communication systems.

services.title: Process Control
details: Automation of continuous processes (chemical, food, pharmaceutical).
Motion control and high-precision servomotors.
Advanced instrumentation and sensing (Industrial IoT, IIoT).
services.alt: Diagram representing industrial process control with sensors and actuators.

services.title: Industrial Software Development
details: Development of customized HMI interfaces.
Applications for remote monitoring and cloud-based control.
MES/MOM systems for production management.
Integration with ERP/CRM systems for full traceability.
services.alt: Computer monitor displaying industrial dashboard analytics.

services.title: Installation and Commissioning
details: Wiring and assembly of control panels and electrical cabinets.
Factory Acceptance Testing (FAT) and Site Acceptance Testing (SAT).
Commissioning and startup of industrial systems.
services.alt: Technicians assembling and testing industrial automation systems.

services.title: Advanced Solutions
details: Industry 4.0 and IIoT: data analytics and industrial big data.
Artificial intelligence for process optimization.
Industrial cybersecurity (network and PLC protection).
Energy efficiency and resource management.
services.alt: Digital interface representing Industry 4.0 and AI-driven systems.

services.title: Maintenance and Support
details: Preventive and corrective maintenance of control systems.
Updating and migration of obsolete systems.
24/7 remote assistance and predictive monitoring.
Training for operational and maintenance personnel.
services.alt: Team of engineers performing industrial equipment maintenance.
